func.title: PlaceVegetation

param.name: id
param.desc: ID of the object to be created.

param.name: x
param.desc: Top left corner of the target rectangle; X coordinate.

param.name: y
param.desc: Top left corner of the target rectangle; Y coordinate.

param.name: growth
param.desc: Growth phase of the target object. Value -1 places vegetation at random growth, otherwise the valid range is 1-100000 (1-100%).

param.name: area
param.desc: If supplied, this may be a Shape-proplist, which overrides the area given by (x,y,width.height) and places the object within the given shape only.

func.desc: Places vegetation in the specified target rectangle. In local calls, the specified coordinates are an offset to the position of the calling object. Note that if an area-proplist is given, that shape is always assumed in global coordinates. Returns a pointer to the newly created plant.
